resources.string: "You are a pilot and you must destroy all of the enemy's hidden submarines with the least amount of sonar missiles wasted. Every time you don't hit a submarine, that counts as" "one missile wasted. Use them wisely"

"Select a spot in the water grid to fire a missile there. If you hit a submarine, you will see the destroyed submarine. If you miss, the missile will be able to send out a sonar" "pulse and the grid spot you clicked will now display a number showing you how many submarines are still hiding within the same row and column.\n" "Click on a destroyed submarine if you want to fire a missile again in that spot for the sole purpose of using the sonar to display a number on that square."
"Game Over: Once all submarines are destroyed, your score will be the number of missiles you wasted. Don't waste many!"

Branko Bajcetic is a Computing Science student at Simon Fraser University in Burnaby, B.C, Canada. This game is a project for SFU\'s Software Engineering (CMPT 276) course.\nWebpage: https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav-cms/cmpt276/home
